original_text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; As I live, surely mine oath that he hath despised, and my covenant that he hath broken, even it will I recompense upon his own head.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 내가 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 그가 내 맹세를 업신여기고 내 언약을 배반하였은즉 내가 그 죄를 그 머리에 돌리되

sentences.original_text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God
surely mine oath that he hath despised
and my covenant that he hath broken
even it will I recompense upon his own head
